title: [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/roslyn
body:

commit.message:
Update dependencies from https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn build 20241201.2

Microsoft.SourceBuild.Intermediate.roslyn , Microsoft.Net.Compilers.Toolset
 From Version 4.13.0-3.24575.2 -> To Version 4.13.0-3.24601.2

Update dependencies from https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn build 20241207.3

Microsoft.SourceBuild.Intermediate.roslyn , Microsoft.Net.Compilers.Toolset
 From Version 4.13.0-3.24575.2 -> To Version 4.13.0-3.24607.3

nodes.body:
CI build failed with the error below.
```
D:\a\1\s\.packages\microsoft.net.compilers.toolset\4.13.0-3.24601.2\tasks\netcore\Microsoft.CSharp.Core.targets(84,5): error : You must install or update .NET to run this application. [D:\a\1\s\src\Framework\Microsoft.Build.Framework.csproj::TargetFramework=net472]
##[error].packages\microsoft.net.compilers.toolset\4.13.0-3.24601.2\tasks\netcore\Microsoft.CSharp.Core.targets(84,5): error : (NETCORE_ENGINEERING_TELEMETRY=Build) You must install or update .NET to run this application.
D:\a\1\s\.packages\microsoft.net.compilers.toolset\4.13.0-3.24601.2\tasks\netcore\Microsoft.CSharp.Core.targets(84,5): error :  [D:\a\1\s\src\Framework\Microsoft.Build.Framework.csproj::TargetFramework=net472]
##[error].packages\microsoft.net.compilers.toolset\4.13.0-3.24601.2\tasks\netcore\Microsoft.CSharp.Core.targets(84,5): error : (NETCORE_ENGINEERING_TELEMETRY=Build) 
D:\a\1\s\.packages\microsoft.net.compilers.toolset\4.13.0-3.24601.2\tasks\netcore\Microsoft.CSharp.Core.targets(84,5): error : App: D:\a\1\s\.packages\microsoft.net.compilers.toolset\4.13.0-3.24601.2\tasks\netcore\bincore\csc.dll [D:\a\1\s\src\Framework\Microsoft.Build.Framework.csproj::TargetFramework=net472]
##[error].packages\microsoft.net.compilers.toolset\4.13.0-3.24601.2\tasks\netcore\Microsoft.CSharp.Core.targets(84,5): error : (NETCORE_ENGINEERING_TELEMETRY=Build) App: D:\a\1\s\.packages\microsoft.net.compilers.toolset\4.13.0-3.24601.2\tasks\netcore\bincore\csc.dll
D:\a\1\s\.packages\microsoft.net.compilers.toolset\4.13.0-3.24601.2\tasks\netcore\Microsoft.CSharp.Core.targets(84,5): error : Architecture: x64 [D:\a\1\s\src\Framework\Microsoft.Build.Framework.csproj::TargetFramework=net472]
##[error].packages\microsoft.net.compilers.toolset\4.13.0-3.24601.2\tasks\netcore\Microsoft.CSharp.Core.targets(84,5): error : (NETCORE_ENGINEERING_TELEMETRY=Build) Architecture: x64
D:\a\1\s\.packages\microsoft.net.compilers.toolset\4.13.0-3.24601.2\tasks\netcore\Microsoft.CSharp.Core.targets(84,5): error : Framework: 'Microsoft.NETCore.App', version '9.0.0' (x64) [D:\a\1\s\src\Framework\Microsoft.Build.Framework.csproj::TargetFramework=net472]
##[error].packages\microsoft.net.compilers.toolset\4.13.0-3.24601.2\tasks\netcore\Microsoft.CSharp.Core.targets(84,5): error : (NETCORE_ENGINEERING_TELEMETRY=Build) Framework: 'Microsoft.NETCore.App', version '9.0.0' (x64)
D:\a\1\s\.packages\microsoft.net.compilers.toolset\4.13.0-3.24601.2\tasks\netcore\Microsoft.CSharp.Core.targets(84,5): error : .NET location: D:\a\1\s\.dotnet\ [D:\a\1\s\src\Framework\Microsoft.Build.Framework.csproj::TargetFramework=net472]
##[error].packages\microsoft.net.compilers.toolset\4.13.0-3.24601.2\tasks\netcore\Microsoft.CSharp.Core.targets(84,5): error : (NETCORE_ENGINEERING_TELEMETRY=Build) .NET location: D:\a\1\s\.dotnet\
D:\a\1\s\.packages\microsoft.net.compilers.toolset\4.13.0-3.24601.2\tasks\netcore\Microsoft.CSharp.Core.targets(84,5): error :  [D:\a\1\s\src\Framework\Microsoft.Build.Framework.csproj::TargetFramework=net472]
##[error].packages\microsoft.net.compilers.toolset\4.13.0-3.24601.2\tasks\netcore\Microsoft.CSharp.Core.targets(84,5): error : (NETCORE_ENGINEERING_TELEMETRY=Build) 
D:\a\1\s\.packages\microsoft.net.compilers.toolset\4.13.0-3.24601.2\tasks\netcore\Microsoft.CSharp.Core.targets(84,5): error : The following frameworks were found: [D:\a\1\s\src\Framework\Microsoft.Build.Framework.csproj::TargetFramework=net472]
##[error].packages\microsoft.net.compilers.toolset\4.13.0-3.24601.2\tasks\netcore\Microsoft.CSharp.Core.targets(84,5): error : (NETCORE_ENGINEERING_TELEMETRY=Build) The following frameworks were found:
D:\a\1\s\.packages\microsoft.net.compilers.toolset\4.13.0-3.24601.2\tasks\netcore\Microsoft.CSharp.Core.targets(84,5): error :   9.0.0-rc.2.24473.5 at [D:\a\1\s\.dotnet\shared\Microsoft.NETCore.App] [D:\a\1\s\src\Framework\Microsoft.Build.Framework.csproj::TargetFramework=net472]
##[error].packages\microsoft.net.compilers.toolset\4.13.0-3.24601.2\tasks\netcore\Microsoft.CSharp.Core.targets(84,5): error : (NETCORE_ENGINEERING_TELEMETRY=Build)   9.0.0-rc.2.24473.5 at [D:\a\1\s\.dotnet\shared\Microsoft.NETCore.App]
```
csc.dll in the updated Microsoft.Net.Compilers.Toolset 4.13.0-3.24601.2 needs Framework: 'Microsoft.NETCore.App', version '9.0.0' (x64), while currently msbuild uses dotnet 9.0.100-rc.2.24474.11 that contains Microsoft.NETCore.App 9.0.0-rc.2.24473.5.

https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/11032 updates dotnet to 9.0.100 containing Microsoft.NETCore.App 9.0.0. Unfortunately, current bootstrap sdk 9.0.200-preview.0.24523.19 contains Microsoft.NETCore.App 9.0.0-rc.2.24473.5 that causes another version mismatch.
